headline.main: Credit Suisse's Dougan to Step Down as CEO-Source
headline.print_headline: Credit Suisse's Dougan to Step Down as CEO-Source

docs.snippet: Brady Dougan is set to step down as Credit Suisse chief executive as soon as Tuesday, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brady Dougan is set to step down as Credit Suisse chief executive as soon as Tuesday, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters.

headline.main: "I still can't find my nephew "-mudslide victim in Peru
headline.sub: "I still can't find my nephew "-mudslide victim in Peru

docs.snippet: Mudslides caused by heavy rains and flooding kill six people in central Peru and severely damage houses and highways. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mudslides caused by heavy rains and flooding kill six people in central Peru and severely damage houses and highways. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

headline.main: North Dakota Farmers Sentenced to Prison for Insurance Fraud
headline.print_headline: North Dakota Farmers Sentenced to Prison for Insurance Fraud

docs.snippet: Two North Dakota brothers were sentenced Monday to prison time and ordered to pay back more than $900,000 for intentionally destroying potatoes to collect federal farm insurance payments....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two North Dakota brothers were sentenced Monday to prison time and ordered to pay back more than $900,000 for intentionally destroying potatoes to collect federal farm insurance payments.

headline.main: Wenger Praise for Welbeck as He Proves a Point
headline.print_headline: Wenger Praise for Welbeck as He Proves a Point

docs.snippet: Players are often reluctant to celebrate goals they score against a former club but Danny Welbeck clearly enjoyed netting Arsenal's winner at Manchester United on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Players are often reluctant to celebrate goals they score against a former club but Danny Welbeck clearly enjoyed netting Arsenal's winner at Manchester United on Monday.

headline.main: Northern California Care Home Operators Face Abuse Charges
headline.print_headline: Northern California Care Home Operators Face Abuse Charges

docs.snippet: Owners of a Northern California care home accused of abandoning patients in a case that garnered national attention were charged Monday with elder abuse....
docs.lead_paragraph: Owners of a Northern California care home accused of abandoning patients in a case that garnered national attention were charged Monday with elder abuse.

headline.main: Merhi to Race for Manor Marussia F1 Team
headline.print_headline: Merhi to Race for Manor Marussia F1 Team

docs.snippet: Spaniard Roberto Merhi will make his Formula One race debut in Australia this weekend after the revived Manor Marussia team named him in their lineup for the season-opener....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spaniard Roberto Merhi will make his Formula One race debut in Australia this weekend after the revived Manor Marussia team named him in their lineup for the season-opener.

headline.main: UK Retail Sales Growth Holds Steady in February-BRC
headline.print_headline: UK Retail Sales Growth Holds Steady in February-BRC

docs.snippet: LONDON, March 10 - British retail spending kept shops busy in what is normally a quiet month in February, suggesting a plunge in inflation has given consumers a boost, an industry survey showed on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 10 - British retail spending kept shops busy in what is normally a quiet month in February, suggesting a plunge in inflation has given consumers a boost, an industry survey showed on Tuesday.

headline.main: Auto Trader Confirms 2 Billion Pounds IPO Plans-FT
headline.print_headline: Auto Trader Confirms 2 Billion Pounds IPO Plans-FT

docs.snippet: UK's online car marketplace operator Auto Trader Group confirmed its plans of an initial public offering, the Financial Times reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: UK's online car marketplace operator Auto Trader Group confirmed its plans of an initial public offering, the Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Officials Predict $300M Revenue Bump for St. Louis Stadium
headline.print_headline: Officials Predict $300M Revenue Bump for St. Louis Stadium

docs.snippet: Missouri economic development officials on Monday told a House panel that building a new football stadium in St. Louis could bring nearly $300 million in net sales tax revenues to the state over the next 30 years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Missouri economic development officials on Monday told a House panel that building a new football stadium in St. Louis could bring nearly $300 million in net sales tax revenues to the state over the next 30 years.

headline.main: Pension Trustees to Join Forces on 'Red Line' AGM Votes
headline.print_headline: Pension Trustees to Join Forces on 'Red Line' AGM Votes

docs.snippet: A British pensions trustee group said on Monday it had launched a "Red Line Voting" initiative to help smaller schemes and other investors take a more active stewardship role in the companies in which they invest....
docs.lead_paragraph: A British pensions trustee group said on Monday it had launched a "Red Line Voting" initiative to help smaller schemes and other investors take a more active stewardship role in the companies in which they invest.
